directions: Preheat the oven to 190°C/ fan170°C/gas 5. Put the leeks and apples into a roasting tin that will hold the sausages in a single layer. Put the sausages on top of the leeks and apples and drizzle over the oil. Season and toss together. Dot with the butter and pour over the cider. Bake for 50 minutes to 1 hour.
About 15 minutes before it’s ready, spread the mustard over the sausages and return to the oven.
Serve the sausages and leeks with extra pan juices spooned over and mash or rosemary roasted potatoes.
ingredients: 3 leeks, washed and cut into 2.5cm lengths
2 apples, cored and cut into wedges
title: Baked sausages with leeks, apples and cider recipe
